name: Keep It A-Live
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 46 with the Theme "Keep It Alive".
I wanted to make a joke on the word Alive by thinking about it as A-Live. You are a police man and you have to make people go away from the radio tower from which they can share dangerous information against the dystopian government, you are a part of the evil side!
They must not go LIVE.

A/D: move
S: drop (from buildings and vehicles)
W: jump
Right Click or Right Shift: dash
